root.name: Star Wars: X-wing vs. TIE Fighter - Balance of Power Campaigns
root.description: Star Wars: X-Wing vs. TIE Fighter -- Balance of Power Campaigns is set in the Airam sector of the Outer Rim. You may play as either a pilot for the Rebellion or the Empire; each campaign includes 15 missions. [Requires X-Wing vs. TIE Fighter to play]
